Title: 42426 - # Ways to Make Money While Traveling
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 ways young professionals can make money while they're traveling. This can include renting out their homes as investment properties, finding teaching programs, or working for a distributed company. The AT can either be used for the rental section or the digital employment section as a way for people to pay you when you're visiting/living in Mexico. Your target audience is young career women who are looking to follow their dreams and travel, but can't afford it by themselves. This solutions offer long-term travelling options, not just a way to make money when on a week-long vacation.

Title: 42427 - # Ways to Earn Money When You're Retired
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 ways retired people can continue to earn money even when they're not working full-time. This can include finding a part-time job a few days a week, renting their houses as vacation homes, and teaching at universities to pass on their knowledge. For the client link, mention that retirement is a time to travel, and your renters can transfer money to you while you see the world. The target audience is elderly readers who don't want to completely live off of their savings (or can't afford it) and need to supplement their income without working at a full-time job.
